text: The batangas or batangas malapad, is a sword originating from the Tagalog people of the Philippines. It is a type of bolo that widens near the tip. It is around long with a hooked hilt grip. ==See also== * Pirah * Weapons of Moroland ==References== Category:Blade weapons Category:Machetes Category:Weapons of the Philippines
title: Batangas (sword)
